item.description:
LEARN TO FLY DAY, MAY 15

YES, the Terrafugia is coming!

as of April 15th...
AWESOME. We are one of only a few doing anything in NE on this day. EAA and AOPA want to know more about us!

I wanted to update everyone on our progress. It has been incredible.

We have some interesting commitments.

Completed
DONE - Remos Display (Richard)
DONE - Flight Design’s LSA Display, www.flightdesign.com (Richard)
DONE - $40 demo flights FCA Flight Center – (Pete and Gary)
DONE - Three Flight Sim computers (Matt)
DONE – FAA Tent (Jim)
DONE - Terrafugia Flying Car (Bob)
DONE - Bullock Charter LearJet (Matt) - Matt needs to remind Rick closer to the event.
DONE - Approval from Liebfried Aviation for location use (Charley)
DONE - FCA Tent (Charley)
DONE - FPA Tent (Matt)
DONE - Greater Boston Soaring Club attendance (Richard)
DONE - Piper Cub on display (Toby)
DONE - T-6 on Display from Reece Dill (Charley)
DONE - Member GA aircraft, Skyhawk, Piper Cherokee, Warrior, Grumman...
DONE - New DA-40 (Jim B)
DONE - Helicopter Display (Steve Brousseau)
DONE - Ground School (Louise)


Action Items
Food Vendor - (Matt) –
ATC, Boston Center Booth (Charley and Bob A)
FPA Merchandise booth (Linda B)
Liebfried Aviation Maintenance Facility (Charley)
EAA involvement/booth/national coverage (Charley)
AOPA doing a follow up story on FIT (Charley)
Stearman display (Kit Tucker)

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site
